com.thomsonreuters.ema.access

Interface OmmOpaque

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComplexType, Data

    public interface OmmOpaque
extends ComplexType
    OmmOpaque represents Opaque data format in Omm. Objects of this class are intended to be short lived or rather transitional.
    This class is designed to efficiently perform setting and extracting of Opaque and its content.
    Objects of this class are not cache-able.
    See Also:
    Data
